languages.text: "Он не открыл мне. Но она... истинно скверна и противна Ему. Вкус ее сладок, как вкус сгнивших вод в прохудившихся трубах. Посулы ее обманчивы, как улыбка блюстителя. Облик же ее... неуловим".
"He did not reveal. But it is corruption itself. It offends Him. It tastes as sweet as fetid waters in old pipes. Its promises are the deception of an enforcer's smile. Its face is... elusive."
languages.original_text: "Он не открыл мне. Но она... истинно скверна и противна Ему. Вкус ее сладок, как вкус сгнивших вод в прохудившихся трубах. Посулы ее обманчивы, как улыбка блюстителя. Облик же ее... неуловим".

languages.text: «No lo reveló, pero es la corrupción en sí misma. Le ofende. Acarrea la dulzura de las aguas fétidas en cañerías viejas. Sus promesas son el engaño en la sonrisa de un guardia. Su rostro es... elusivo».
languages.original_text: "He did not reveal. But it is corruption itself. It offends Him. It tastes as sweet as fetid waters in old pipes. Its promises are the deception of an enforcer's smile. Its face is... elusive."

traits.locale_text: «No lo reveló, pero es la corrupción en sí misma. Le ofende. Acarrea la dulzura de las aguas fétidas en cañerías viejas. Sus promesas son el engaño en la sonrisa de un guardia. Su rostro es... elusivo».

languages.text: 「ハッキリとは示されなかった。しかし、それは腐敗そのものだ。あの方を怒らせる。古いパイプの中の腐った水のような甘さだ。その約束は、エンフォーサーの詐欺師のような微笑み。その顔は…とらえどころがない」
languages.original_text: "He did not reveal. But it is corruption itself. It offends Him. It tastes as sweet as fetid waters in old pipes. Its promises are the deception of an enforcer's smile. Its face is... elusive."

traits.locale_text: 「ハッキリとは示されなかった。しかし、それは腐敗そのものだ。あの方を怒らせる。古いパイプの中の腐った水のような甘さだ。その約束は、エンフォーサーの詐欺師のような微笑み。その顔は…とらえどころがない」

languages.text: “祂并没有明示，但那就是腐化本身，它的存在就是对祂的冒犯。它的味道就像是旧水管里的臭水一样甘甜，它的承诺就像是执法者微笑中的欺骗一般。它的脸……难以捉摸。”
languages.original_text: "He did not reveal. But it is corruption itself. It offends Him. It tastes as sweet as fetid waters in old pipes. Its promises are the deception of an enforcer's smile. Its face is... elusive."

traits.locale_text: “祂并没有明示，但那就是腐化本身，它的存在就是对祂的冒犯。它的味道就像是旧水管里的臭水一样甘甜，它的承诺就像是执法者微笑中的欺骗一般。它的脸……难以捉摸。”

languages.text: "Er hat nichts offenbart. Doch es ist die Verderbnis selbst. Sie beleidigt ihn. Sie schmeckt so süß wie ranziges Wasser in alten Rohren. Ihre Versprechen sind die Täuschung des Lächelns eines Enforcers. Ihr Gesicht ist ... nicht zu fassen."
languages.original_text: "He did not reveal. But it is corruption itself. It offends Him. It tastes as sweet as fetid waters in old pipes. Its promises are the deception of an enforcer's smile. Its face is... elusive."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat nichts offenbart. Doch es ist die Verderbnis selbst. Sie beleidigt ihn. Sie schmeckt so süß wie ranziges Wasser in alten Rohren. Ihre Versprechen sind die Täuschung des Lächelns eines Enforcers. Ihr Gesicht ist ... nicht zu fassen."

languages.text: « Il n'a pas jugé bon de me le dire, mais il s'agit de la corruption incarnée. Une offense à Sa sainte loi dont le goût est douceâtre comme les eaux résiduelles qui croupissent dans les vieux tuyaux et dont les promesses sont pareilles au sourire perfide d'un prévôt. Ses traits, quant à eux, sont... insaisissables. »
languages.original_text: "He did not reveal. But it is corruption itself. It offends Him. It tastes as sweet as fetid waters in old pipes. Its promises are the deception of an enforcer's smile. Its face is... elusive."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'a pas jugé bon de me le dire, mais il s'agit de la corruption incarnée. Ses traits, quant à eux, sont... insaisissables. »

languages.text: "Bunu açıklığa kavuşturmadı lakin yozlaşmanın ta kendisini kastediyorum. Yozlaşma O'nu huzursuz eder. Damakta eski borulardaki kokuşmuş su misali bir tat bırakır. Vaatleri, bir infazcının gülümsemesinde yatan aldatmacadır. Yüzü... Tariflerin ötesindedir."
languages.original_text: "He did not reveal. But it is corruption itself. It offends Him. It tastes as sweet as fetid waters in old pipes. Its promises are the deception of an enforcer's smile. Its face is... elusive."
